description: A Giovanni was an unusual model right from start. First, he brought along his wife to the interview and second, he arrived so early we were still meeting with the model scheduled before him. I sent his wife to do some shopping and we had him wait in the office.When I went to get him, he had found a porno mag and was already had his pants open and was stroking a big fat club of a cock. Clearly he was more then eager and not wasting the opportunity to bring you one horny Italian, I grabbed the camera and started shooting right on the spot. Giovanni is fresh from the Jersey shore with a thick eight inch pepperoni on a tight lean little body. I would have straightened up the place if I knew I'd be filming there but after he stands and sprays a huge load of juice all over the desk, we had more then enough cleaning up to do!
title: Guido In A Speedo
